text: a scar that runs down a trail down [possessivesubject] [part] splitting an old faded tattoo
[possessivesubject] [part] has been replaced with a mechanical prosthetic of cold steel
[possessivesubject] [part] scarred and protuding with the parts of forced cybernetic enhancement
a warped mouth, filled with lined rows of teeth
[possessivesubject] face stained purple and blue, [possessivesubject] veins stark against [possessivesubject] skin white as parafin
[possessivesubject] horn twisting upwards and around, decorated with studs of gold and gem stones
[possessivesubject] eyes filled with darkness, [possessivesubject] iris a black circle in an inky void
[possessivesubject] arm twisted and ending in clawed hands, stained with gore
[possessivesubject] antenna that twitches and cracks unsettlingly

[possessivesubject] leg removed just below the knee, with a rather ordinary peg in it's place

[possessivesubject] tail is heavily tattooed, with some studs pierced into it
